A version of '''[[Minecraft Indev]]''' was released on '''February 12, 2010, at 16:22 UTC.'''

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[HUD]]'''
* Added "Free memory" and "Allocated memory" information to the top right corner.
** Displays with the §8 (gray) [[color code]] instead of the usual §f (white).

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''{{Animate|Chainmail Armor JE1 BE1.png; Diamond Armor JE1 BE1.png; Golden Armor JE1 BE1.png; Iron Armor JE1 BE1.png; Leather Armor JE1.png|32px}} [[Armor]]'''
* Armor no longer displays on the player.

=== General ===
'''General'''
* Skin now works.
* Skins other than Notch's are now displayed, although without a skin proxy, the player appears completely black.
* The crosshair now turns the opposite color of what it is covering.

'''[[Music]]'''
* Is now disabled.

'''[[Sound]]s'''
* Is now disabled.

== Fixes ==
* This version may have been released to track down a bug.<ref>[[wordofnotch:385693993|I need your help debugging indev]] – The Word of Notch, February 12, 2010</ref></onlyinclude>
